snippet.title: Starminer Announcement | Paradox Arc
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1116050/Starminer/

Starminer is a new upcoming game from Cool And Good Games, published by Paradox Arc, that sees you take your seat as an interstellar contractor. Starting with a singular small node ship, you must gather resources from nearby asteroid fields and grow your ship and your fleet.

Whether your goal is to mine resources for profit, become a defensive powerhouse, promote colonization, or something else entirely, must beware. The alien threat is very real, and they'll track your heat signature the more you expand! Keep flying, keep safe, keep cool.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/starminergame
Discord: https:/discord.gg/WzYymcD
CoolAndGoodGames' YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGSmt69CFWI0ADJKBZY-uOw

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#ParadoxInteractive #Paradox
